sent_1.text: A prospective , double - blinded , randomized trial was performed .

sent_2.text: Twenty patients receiving orthotopic liver transplants from October 2000 to October 2001 were randomized into two groups .

sent_3.text: Group 1 ( active ) was administered tacrolimus , 20 ng / mL , plus Plasma-lyte A ( Baxter Healthcare Corp , Deerfield , IL ) liver flush solution ; and group 2 ( placebo ) was administered only Plasma-lyte A. Ischemia / reperfusion injury was assessed in both groups after transplantation by means of serum laboratory values to assess hepatocellular damage , synthetic function , and ion transport capacity .

sent_4.text: Peak values were recorded for each parameter , and their distributions were compared .
